alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 13 at 1:26PM MST until February 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph...or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
